name: Manchester United Home Jersey
description: Official Manchester United home jersey featuring the iconic red color with black accents. Made with moisture-wicking fabric for optimal performance. Includes the club crest and sponsor logos. Perfect for match days or casual wear to show your support for the Red Devils.

name: Barcelona Away Jersey
description: Barcelona's stunning away jersey in classic blue and burgundy stripes. Crafted with Dri-FIT technology for superior comfort and breathability. Features the FC Barcelona badge and Nike swoosh. A must-have for any Bar√ßa fan.

name: Real Madrid Third Jersey
description: Real Madrid's sleek third jersey in elegant black with gold details. Premium quality construction with AEROREADY technology. Features the iconic Real Madrid crest and Adidas three stripes. Perfect for Los Blancos supporters worldwide.

name: Liverpool Retro Jersey
description: Classic Liverpool retro jersey celebrating the club's golden era. Features the traditional all-red design with vintage styling. Made from comfortable cotton blend fabric. A nostalgic piece for any Liverpool FC fan who appreciates the club's rich history.
